channel.title: [PI] Objects show ID# when clicked on? [PI]
channel.description: Hey guys whenever i click on an object in project insanity it comes up in the chat box telling me the object id and the coordinates. It not a problem but its annoying, how do I stop it from telling me?

item.title: [PI] Objects show ID# when clicked on? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

its only for admins,but if you want to fix it go
server/models/players

clickobjects and
comment out this

} else if (c.playerRights == 3) { c.sendMessage("objectId: " + c.objectId + " objectX: " + c.objectX + " objectY: " + c.objectY);
